LanguageData.CounselFailed.stages.failed_consolation_: Somehow, that attempt at helping made things even worse.
LanguageData.Counselled.stages.counselled_by.label: counselled by {0}
LanguageData.Counselled.stages.counselled_by.descript: I received counseling about something that's been bothering me.
LanguageData.Counselled_MoodBoost.stages.counselled_b: I received counseling from someone. It felt nice to be listened to.
LanguageData.FailedConvertAbilityInitiator.stages.fai: I tried to convert someone and it didn't work out. Awkward.
LanguageData.FailedConvertAbilityRecipient.stages.tri: Someone tried to convert me. I wish they'd just leave me alone.
LanguageData.TendedByMedicalSpecialist.stages.tended_: I received medical aid from one who carries the special healer status of my ideoligion.
